javax.jdo.listener
Interface DetachLifecycleListener

All Superinterfaces:
InstanceLifecycleListener
public interface DetachLifecycleListener
extends InstanceLifecycleListener

This interface is implemented by listeners to be notified of detach events.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0

Method Summary
 void postDetach(InstanceLifecycleEvent event)
          This method is called during the execution of PersistenceManager.detachCopy(T) after the detached copy is made.
 void preDetach(InstanceLifecycleEvent event)
          This method is called during the execution of PersistenceManager.detachCopy(T) before the detached copy is made.
 

Method Detail

preDetach

void preDetach(InstanceLifecycleEvent event)
This method is called during the execution of PersistenceManager.detachCopy(T) before the detached copy is made. It is called before the method DetachCallback.jdoPreDetach() is called on the instance to be detached.

Parameters:
event - the detach event.
Since:
2.0

postDetach

void postDetach(InstanceLifecycleEvent event)
This method is called during the execution of PersistenceManager.detachCopy(T) after the detached copy is made. It is called after the method DetachCallback.jdoPreDetach() is called on the detached instance.

Parameters:
event - the detach event.
Since:
2.0
